title: On the Arm
overview: Louis Sareno, a young man born into the mob, searches for a way out of the only life he's ever known. Looking to find purpose and meaning in his life, Louis finds himself tumbling further down the rabbit hole of the Mafia's stranglehold on the city.

title: The Wise Guys
overview: Danny, Keys and Zaquersonn are the "Wise Guys", the three brothers of the Cornettos, an "Italian" mafia family. They plan the heist of the millennium only to be thwarted by the rival family, the Gelatos, who were working with someone within the family. The Wise Guys must uncover the mole in the family in order to recover the money that they rightfully stole.

title: Bay Area Gangstaz
overview: A gangsta' rapper fresh out of county jail returns to the crime ridden streets of Oakland and gets back into the drug game to get his money and number one escort back from the rival Bay Area gangsta' pimps that want him dead.

title: PLACEBO
overview: This is the story of Leonardo and Federico, two students who have never accomplished anything in their lives... Maybe
tagline: IT JUST MUST LOOK LIKE IT.

title: Max Clifford: The Fall of a Tabloid King
overview: Max Clifford was a powerful media publicist to the stars. But in 2014 he was jailed for historic sex crimes. Now, the survivors of his abuse tell their stories.

title: The Zodiac
overview: The history of the infamous serial killer known as the ‘zodiac’ in the late 1960s. It takes you through his kill rampage and to the case that still to this day has not been cracked.
tagline: The story that has had no end.

title: The Cannabis Diary
overview: Traumatized from his past killings, Arjun Singh looks for clues related to his nightmares. During his investigation, Arjun Singh discovers the real importance of Medical Marijuana for the mankind.
French Guiana, South America: When two armed men enter the Amazon rainforest on a clandestine mission, one of them emerges with a darker soul.

title: Killing Kitty
overview: Fabulous fashionista fame whore Chelsea and petty power bottom Blake kill snide bitch extraordinaire Kitty, a semi-famous influencer, at a Halloween party.

title: Jessica Chambers: An ID Murder Mystery
overview: In December 2014, 19-year-old Jessica Chambers was set on fire inside her car and burned to death. Hardworking detectives arrest a suspect and the District Attorney brings him to trial, looking for justice for Jessica.

title: Swing: The Movie
overview: In the gritty streets of 1945 Philadelphia, aspiring jazz musician and street hustler, Trip, dreams of a life-changing opportunity awaiting him in the vibrant world of Harlem. With three days until the audition, his journey takes an unexpected turn as he finds himself entangled in a web of corruption, vengeful gangsters, and the ominous presence of a mysterious figure.

title: Room 702
overview: Detective Sheryl Cortez unravels a 10-year-old case about a haunted hotel room possessed by what is known to be called “The Pale Rider”. When working with Louis Rosario just may have some details about the evil entity that haunts Room 702.

title: Dan's Dead
overview: A young guy accidentally kills his drug dealer. Him and his cousin must get rid of the body.  A film made as part of the second-year filmmaking module at the Uni of York.

title: Danny Detective Inc.
overview: Subrata Sharma is a reporter who leaves his job and joins a small time detective agency, Danny Detective Inc. in Kolkata. Working on a kidnapping case, his boss, Danny, is killed. Circumstances force Subrata to take up the case. He travels to the Dooars, south of the outer foothills of the Himalayas, to unravel a big time criminal underworld. He takes up the responsibility of the agency. How will he succeed in catching the killer?
tagline: A small-time guyʼs ethical triumph against big-time corruption

title: Tippy Toes
overview: Sam is a nice guy, but niceness only gets you so far.

title: Streetwalkin' Cowboy
overview: A delusional man in a modern day city dresses, acts like, and has the mindset of a cowboy.

title: The Contractor
overview: A mafia member is late on repaying his debts, The Contractor comes to collect

title: Stabby Stabby
overview: A criminal organization realizes that there's a spy amongst them. Will they be able to find out who the rat is before they're all eliminated?

title: A Family Business
overview: When Brendan turns 18, he reaches out to his biological father for the first time in hopes of joining the family business, The Mob.

title: The Killing of Frank Coudiere
overview: Career criminal Frank Coudiere is ambushed in his home by a figure from his past.

title: Amethyst
overview: Haziel becomes involved in an obsession that leads him to ruin his short life.
tagline: An obsession will never be love.

title: Witness to a Murder
overview: Three people tell their own version of the same tragedy.

title: Not Reachable
overview: After getting a tip through an app, about a girl being kidnapped, the cops reach the crime scene, only to find out that another girl has been murdered there. How did this happen? Where is the girl who was kidnapped?

title: Serial Killer Psyche: The Horror Within
overview: What creates a serial killer? Many were deeply affected by unimaginable life experiences that defy comprehension. Some were physically and mentally abused by loved ones during childhood, others exposed to the darkest aspects of humanity changing them into monsters, while some have a genetic bias toward extinguishing the life of others. Explore the horror within the individuals that commit the most heinous acts of murder and violence.
tagline: Want to know how serial killers come to be?

title: Last Time
overview: Tadas, his pregnant girlfriend Grete and friend Robis live in an abandoned house. The couple decides to start a course of addiction treatment, but before they do, they are tempted to use heroin for the last time.

production_companies.name: Lithuanian Academy of Music and Theatre

title: To The Inside
overview: An absurdist arthouse comedy set in Liverpool.

title: Nefarious
overview: Your friends and enemies have one thing in common, you! Mark leaves his girlfriend to be with Natasha, the girl he truly loves, but her brother Andrew comes with the relationship. Willing to sacrifice all, he adheres to Andrew's manipulations while keeping Natasha ignorant of their deeds, which takes him through a series of violent and necromantic events, thus leading to his purpose in a much darker scheme. Ultimately, Natasha knows that love can be a cure...

title: Jungle
overview: A young woman awakens to find herself in the midst of a living nightmare.

title: Borut
overview: Borut, a hitman with suicidal tendencies who wants to leave his old life behind, receives a call from his boss who supposedly has one last job for him.

title: The Abduction of Milly Dowler
overview: This true crime documentary about the case of Milly Dowler looks in new detail at the role of the media, the police investigation into her disappearance and Levi Bellfield, the man who was eventually convicted of her murder. Why did it take police so long to look at Bellfield, who lived just yards from where Milly was last seen? And what was behind the tabloids’ hacking of Milly’s phone?

title: Personal Opinion
overview: Working together for many years, two policemen decide to steal by taking a tip from a thief. In the house they enter to rob, they become the prisoners of the power struggle that develops with wrong ideas. The struggle for supremacy, which completely takes them under control, continues with various lies. Telling the biggest lie will commit the biggest crime.

title: Trump Card
overview: IFP film made in 50 hours by Chitraa Studios

title: Motel
overview: Ten stories that begin the same way: a couple enters a love-hotel room.

title: Der Kroatien-Krimi: Die Patin von Privonice
Among the Lost
overview: A witch, a pair of escorts, and a hired gun, unleash a centuries-old curse. Now there is only one way to break the spell, an offering of blood.
tagline: What happens if you kill the devil?

title: Hell In My Life: The Stacey Staxx Story
overview: The Stacey Staxx Story is based upon the novel and true story about a 16 year old female who was molested by her mothers boyfriend. Who experience so much pain and grittiness at a young age. Her mother was a drug addict who exposed her daughter to multiple men. Her only care in the world was her drugs. She didn't love herself nor her daughter. Stacey getting tired of being abused decided it was time to put things to an end. Trying to protect herself ending up her making a deadly choice. She left home, left the state with Martina a Madam that she had met. Wanting to live the lavish lifestyle she jumped into the fast life of stripping and prostitution. So much occurred during her new fast lifestyle, so many experiences good and bad. Still life had other plans and luck seemed to never be on her side. She faces a life or death situation when she's kidnapped... Base off True Story - "Hell In My Life- The Stacey Staxx Story."

title: Air Ball
overview: Alex, a young basketball player, trying to make it to the top of the big leagues. Will he accomplish his dreams or be dragged down by his neglective parents and despicable coach?
tagline: Will Alex become the basketball player of his dreams?

title: Whole Burnt
overview: During The Second World War, a Nazi officer is open against the Holocaust and anti-Semitism, until his roommate hears his ideas and decides to give him a lesson.

title: Giorni
overview: A man in crisis, disappointed by others and by himself.

title: Solamente tu
overview: A manager and his company. Power, greed, decline. When the social relationships that wealth presupposed are broken, there seems to be nothing more than a bond of fidelity: that with a dog.

title: The House on Sweet and Seventh
overview: A look back at the murders of Barbara and Gordon Erickstad, who were brutally killed in their North Dakota home by their son, 18-year-old Brian Erickstad, and his friend, 27-year-old Robert Lawrence in September 1998.

title: All In
overview: A comedy about the fate of three friends robbing the state treasury of gold during the plague.

title: The Incomplete Man
overview: A police officer gets involved in a very peculiar case when he discovers he shares his name with the main suspect.

title: Visceral
overview: A lawyer dives into the heart of the organ mafia to save her son.

title: Blood of Bad Men
overview: Dillon is left for dead by his partners in crime, the Crime Queen they ripped off wants them all found. The question is who will find who first.  Director Ross Bigley Stars Michael ChobanoffAnieya WalkerKevin Croak

title: Poser
overview: A local skate legend returns from out-of-state rehab to star in a documentary about his recovery only to have the project derailed when a drug stash is uncovered in an old hangout spot.
tagline: Fake punks, fake pills...what could go wrong?

overview: A reservation call is made by a prostitute for a particular room number 302 where she lures her clients and attacks them.

title: Neither Girl Nor Woman
overview: In 1987, Federico (Felipe Vieira), who works for an Italian mafia, questions a decision made in a recent past, remembering moments together with his wife Giovanna (Marcela Cipriani). All this when going to another service, buy a Ford Model-A year 1929 with his partner Marcello (Fábio Vergani). What Federico still hasn't figured out is whether the choice he made was right or wrong, and whether those two options are still available.
tagline: Even being gangsters as they were, they never stopped being men.

title: The Partner
overview: A series of severe criminal cases happened in Yangguan, an industrial town in Northwest China. Chen Hanzhong, the detective on the case, commutes to the gobi, fallen villages and desolate industrial landscapes with colleagues day after day. They got some clues, and more questions as well. As time passed, they realized that to solve the case is also to solve the mysteries in their lives. Suddenly, work and life, memory and reality, all begin to interweave at a certain moment.

title: Behind the Eight Ball
overview: (To be confirmed)

title: Clue
overview: During a championship football game, a star quarterback is shot in the middle of the field, creating a media frenzy. Inspector Fudge is called to investigate the case. As he examines the scene and interviews witnesses, the trail unexpectedly leads him to the Markingham family, owners of a major manufacturing conglomerate.  Initially, the connection between the shooting and the Markinghams seems tenuous. However, as Fudge delves deeper into their business dealings and personal lives, he discovers a web of corporate secrets, rivalries, and hidden agendas. His investigation reveals links between the shooting and a high-stakes industrial espionage scheme involving the Markinghams' company.  The more Fudge uncovers, the clearer it becomes that the shooting might be just the tip of the iceberg. With each twist and turn, the case grows more complex, suggesting that the motivations behind the crime are far more elaborate and dangerous than anyone initially anticipated.

title: So It Goes
overview: A young couple in love drive around committing murders. Bodies, guns, knives, ropes, and bottles are scattered everywhere. From fields and forests to rivers, seas, and urban landscapes, they go wherever they please, as long as they’re together.

title: Grief
overview: Through the eyes of "Sing" we observe her partner in crime unravel and ultimately reveal the truth of his choices.

title: Der Amsterdam-Krimi: Der Dreck der Anderen
When Girls Ride
overview: When Samantha leaves the South to have a fresh start with her husband, she ends up meeting two biker girls named Raquel and Tammy. The three women grow close, and decide to start their own women's bike club. Things take a turn for the worse when they lose a girl from their group to violence. The women respond accordingly in order to get justice for their friend.
tagline: Look like baddies but ride like beasts.

title: The Lovers
overview: Anirudh is an Indian young guy whose life changes when his wife files a case against him under Act 498A: domestic violence. As the story unfolds, it conveys how lack of communication between parents and children destroys many lives in a marriage.

title: Country Hard
overview: Country Hard is a hyperlink crime-drama that explores a day in the lives of seven strangers as their paths interconnect in a way that may alter their lives forever.

title: Cold Noodle
overview: A mysterious blood-soaked man running away for his life, try to seek help from a friends whos an underdog mafia gang.
Manikandan who is desperately in search of money to settle his debts finds a $1000 note. What happens next forms the rest of the story

title: Claudio's Song
overview: A young man faces the wrath of a family of criminals that target people who are famous on the internet and extort money from them. When their scheme fails, the plan to kill him takes an unexpected turn.

title: Childish
overview: A young man, unsatisfied with his life and overwhelmed by adulthood, reminisces about childhood to a dangerous degree.

title: Booze, Broads and Blackjack
overview: What happens in Vegas doesn't stay there. An East Coast radio DJ working for his gangster uncle is targeted by the mob itself after his girlfriend witnesses a murder.

title: Fingerguns: A Fast Story
overview: Felix "Fingerguns" Ramirez faces a world of capes, conspiracies, and cosmic horrors.

title: The Midnight Screening Society
overview: Four criminals break into the Cinematheque of Curitiba, determined to screen films that have never been seen before.
tagline: Four criminals break into the Cinematheque of Curitiba, determined to screen films that have never been seen before.

title: Yes Man
overview: Darrell, an intern at a corporate company, does not buy into the white-collar culture of ‘going along to get along’. He chooses to surround himself amongst a few bad apples. Darrell finds himself stuck between a rock and a hard place. The advice given to him by Ben, a violent group leader, keeps him narrow-minded about his environment until his friend Ryan, an intelligent hustler with dreams of opening a restaurant, shows Darrell to think about what he wants for his future.

title: Antarctic bear
overview: A man and a woman walk through the night of the city of Cordoba following clues left by an old man in a series of small wooden boxes. The clues reveal information about the city's statues and their mysterious links to local history.
tagline: Connection between a statue and the history of Cordoba

title: Boran Uygun's No: 1
overview: An Irish cop trying to find his wife's murderer with helps of photographers in a fictional Neo-noir New-York-like Irish city.

title: It Happened on... - The Bührle Art Robbery
Kleptomaniac
overview: A short film about a young thief who had recently stole a bag with unknown contents. Can they resist the urge to open the bag?

title: Instant Life
overview: A criminal gets more than he bargained for after robbing a magic shop.

title: Platoon07: A Great Marksman
overview: A retired army officer with exceptional marksmanship becomes an assassin for a crime lord, but things go awry when an old comrade is targeted.

title: Crow Island
overview: Set in a remote island in Kerala, Kakathuruth tells the tale of Jose, a newcomer to the island who befriends Kannappan, a fish farmer from a neighbouring plot.  Kannappan and his father are the only people remaining in the line of fish farmers who have been living in the island for centuries. As the story progresses, it becomes clear that Jose may have an ulterior motive.

title: Kaltmiete
overview: A young nurse urgently needs an apartment until his age-old favorite patient offers him to live with her. But then everything turns out differently.

title: Walk Out
overview: After being kidnapped and beaten, a dangerous criminal ventures to the house of those that attacked him.
tagline: The Commitment And Dedication Of A Dangerous Criminal

title: Triangle Slave
overview: Orphaned brothers Keith and Kareem struggle in the world today after losing their mother, who was murdered by their father to pay a debt. Through adversary and perseverance, they rose to become two of the biggest drug kingpins in Philadelphia. But when a woman named Sapphire comes between them, will their empire collapse under the weight of their greed and jealousy?
tagline: The love of a woman can be a dangerous thing.

title: Enter the World of Hans Zimmer: The Dark Knight
overview: An original interpretation of the Joker's origin story as an entry for Hans Zimmer's video contest hosted by Sony Music, Enter the World of Hans Zimmer: The Dark Knight.

title: Blind ermittelt: Die nackte Kaiserin
overview: While inspector Alexander Haller relies on his investigative instincts, his partner Nikolai Falk has to overcome irrational fears. Screenwriter Nils-Morten Osburg uses the admiration for the Habsburg monarch, who, out of vanity, did not allow herself to be photographed for decades, as the background for a sophisticated story about a photograph that should never have been taken.

title: Pack of Sheep
overview: In a remote Greek town, a local businessman who has a debt, tries to join forces with the loanshark’s other deptors. But not everyone sees things the same way. Will he commit two murders?

title: Chedda Boys
overview: King's a promising basketball prospect raised in a family of drug dealing. Eager to make his name, after graduating high school he joins his cousins in expanding the family business becoming major players in the drug world

title: Safe House 1618
overview: A revenge plot traps 3 sisters and their getaway driver in a safe house until they can escape the country, but they may be running from so much more than just the police.

title: Yellow Board
overview: Journey through the lives of Bangalore's taxi drivers and their struggles, and how a hero will rise among them.

title: Mud Flat Murders
overview: A detective on a mission to solve murders around town struggles with racism and his jealousy over his best friend's new love life.

title: The Take Out Move
overview: When a shadowy figure instructs two different men to take out the same woman, they end up at her home at the same time and must fight each other through absurd situations to be the one to complete the assignment.

title: Cleaner
overview: Two mob cleaners fall in love in the process of getting rid of a body.

title: The Perfectionist
overview: The lives of a costume store owner, two mobsters, a snuff filmmaker, intertwine on a day of total mayhem.

title: Ladies Choice
overview: A male exotic dancer named Choice and his fellow exotic entertainers find themselves in a bind after taking on a side job outside of their normal club which escalates into sex, lies, and a race against time.

title: Killing Gucci: People Magazine Investigates
overview: The name Gucci is synonymous with glamour, but in 1995 the fashion world is shocked when the one-time heir to the family dynasty is gunned down. A two-year investigation reveals a family at each other’s throats and a murder plot made for Hollywood.
